item.title: The Implicit Bias of Gradient Descent toward Collaboration between Layers: A Dynamic Analysis of Multilayer Perceptions
item.description: Deep learning models’ success hinges on understanding gradient descent’s implicit bias. This study reveals how this bias influences layer collaboration, revealing a decreasing trend in adversarial rob…
